t: Carrier and ICP: 'Distinct and separate' | ACHR News

t: International Comfort Products - Wikipedia
s: March 27, 2025 - ICP is a Carrier subsidiary. ICP makes oil and gas furnaces, heat pumps, and central air-conditioning systems for residential and commercial customers. It manufacturers, markets, and sells residential heating and cooling systems under the Arcoaire, Comfortmaker, Day & Night, Heil, KeepRite, Lincoln, and Tempstar brands...

t: International Comfort Products (ICP) Are there any Brand Differences?

t: Carrier Global - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - International Comfort Products (ICP), headquartered in Lewisburg, Tennessee, was acquired by Carrier in 1999. In the 1990s, Carrier stopped using the "Day & Night" brand (which was the "D" in the BDP division, or Bryant-Day & Night-Payne) but it was revived in 2006 by ICP.
